data.title: Abolish Iowa's Broken Certificate of Need Law
data.meta_description: Abolish CON, CON, Iowa certificate of need legislation, ASC, Ambulatory surgery Center
data.text:
Click each Group to send a MASS email to these Public Servants

Mass Email Group #1

Mass Email Group #2

Mass Email Group #3

Mass Email Group #4

Mass Email Group #5

Instructions: Clicking the above links will launch your email client, eg: Outlook and create a new email with the addresses and subject line pre-filled for your convenience. Type your email seperately to each of these 5 Mass Email Groups.

Please be courteous to your elected officials. Example letter:

I urge you to take up the cause of lowering healthcare costs to the citizens of Iowa. As you may already know, the antiquated Certificate of Need Laws artifitially inflate healthcare costs. 14 states across the country have already abolished their CON Laws in order to lower healthcare costs, and the Hospitals are still thriving in these states. Thank you for your efforts toward preserving our nation's future.

Sincererly
